Introduction
This topic contains information on determining the unemployability or marginal employment of farmers, including
computing the net return from a farm
considering
farm size
supplementation of farm income prior to disablement
the type of work
, and
past work history
comparing the Veteran’s income and hours of work with those of other farmers
, and
considering the Veteran’s supervision of a farm
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Determining Disability, Unemployability, and Marginal Employment for Pension
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
